name: Jeepney Frenzy
description:
Jeepney Frenzy is a two player competitive party game where two players take the role of Jeepney Drivers trying to get the most passengers until the timer ends. 

Best played with two controllers!

Controls:

Controller:

Left Stick to control your jeepney

Spam A button to pick up a passenger

Hold E near a stop to drop off the passengers

Press Right Shift to boost.

Keyboard:

WASD  to control your jeepney

Spam SPACE BAR to pick up a passenger

Hold X near a stop to drop off the passengers

Press B to boost.

It is currently on hold as I am stuck at a certain part of the development and I don't know how to progress from it.
